title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When creating several report parameters and setting default values for them, these default values are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: The 'Show Report Parameters' dialog should display the default values set for each report parameter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create several report parameters. 
2. Set default values for these parameters. 
3. Drag the report parameters to the Layout. 
4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog. 
Expected result: The default values of the report parameters should be displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
